skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Creating responsive, visually appealing interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for seamless user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Developing scalable server-side applications with Python, Node.js, and Java for efficient data management.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Designing user-friendly interfaces and enhancing experiences through research, wireframing, and user testing.

skills.title: Java
skills.description: Building high-performance applications using Java, focusing on scalability, maintainability, and code quality.

portfolio.title: Harvest-Hub
portfolio.description: An e-commerce website dedicated to enabling customers to purchase local produce, promoting local farmers, and ensuring a quality guarantee for customers.

portfolio.title: Cloud-Home
portfolio.description: A file storage platform that allows users to upload and manage their files, including images, in the cloud using an organized folder structure..

portfolio.title: Uni-Chat
portfolio.description: An app that enables seamless chatting and communication among university students, allowing them to share images, PDFs, and other files effortlessly.
